t: Amazon.com: Koolpak Reusable Luxury Hot and Cold Pack 12cm x 29cm : Health & Household
s: To heat up the Koolpak Reusable Luxury Hot and Cold Pack, place the pack in a microwave for 20 seconds, then check it. If more heat is required, follow up with 10-second bursts until hot. Do not overheat in the microwave. To cool down the pack, place it in a freezer.
